attributes.action: Stop Windsor/Maidenhead Council from issuing £100 fine for rough sleepers.
attributes.additional_details: Windsor council set to fine homeless people sleeping rough before royal wedding - The Independent
attributes.background: Firstly, how are the homeless going to pay the fine? They’re not. Resulting in them returning to court and being charged court fees and a victim surcharge, more money which they won’t be able to pay.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could start a new petition calling for the power to issue fines to people who are sleeping rough to be removed from all councils, if that's what you'd like to happen.
